definition: palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: A: I think I’ll have a Kung Pao chicken, since that’s their specialty.
sentences.chinese: 我想我要一份宮爆雞丁，這是他們的招牌菜。

sentences.english: Our specialties are stern-fried chicken with pepper and sliced cold chicken.
sentences.chinese: 我們的特色菜是宮爆雞丁和白斬雞。
